name: CrestFallen
description:
This game is made by Dark Before Dawn. Dark Before Dawn is a small group of college students and this is our first game project as a group.

Our game, CrestFallen, is a space survival platformer where the player is on a ship that has crashed and is looking for parts to repair an escape pod. The player will be faced against aliens that have overtaken the ship and will be left with limited supplies to survive. The player must fight through to escape the ship alive. 

This game is still in development and will have additions added as time goes on.
